numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows how young men and young women socialize with their parents.
5. Women communicate with their parents more than men do in all forms.
6. I wonder if built-in societal norms exist for women.
7. I wonder if these societal norms concern the role of women in family and socialization.
8. I wonder how this chart would compare to a similar chart from 30 years ago.
9. This topic relates to me and my community.
10. I am almost entering the age range that these statistics concern.
11. It makes me sad that one day I will not see my parents every day.
12. People often take their families for granted.
13. I hope that I will communicate with my family on a normal basis when I am older.
14. The headline is: Staying Connected in 2024.
